reviewText: This dvd is a waste of money, I forgot I had even owned it, its so lame that I gave it to my parents years ago, its that kind of dvd, its not anything you wouldn't find on any cable show or R-movie, someone born in 1920 to 1945 might find it remotely interesting if they don't have cable and live in a cave but otherwise save your money. This gimmick dvd was obviously made as a cheap money generator for Playboy. I wouldn't pay $5 for the dvd to rebuy it but as a gag gift for your parents you might pay a little higher.

You would think that you could not go wrong with bare skin but this is not as interesting as Playboy - Women of Wal-Mart though there is a clip of that in the extras along with others in the collection. There are six gals (4 blond and two brunettes) in this 50 min. production so each model gets about eight minutes. Some briefly appear in and out of uniform and then some get an additional scene before they pose in a different outfit. There is some nude bowling which is interesting and one gal takes a shower when the discussion turns to the smell that the business produces on clothing. They are all well-endowed but all their interviews are somewhat lame. One talks like a hillbilly, very unattractive. Some are shaved. They talk about customers and hopes that by modeling they can get a better job---. Some are attractive. Watchable. I question if the cover girl is amongst the models, maybe. Two are from Canada, Ohio, Penn, KY, and Flordia.

I like this DVD because the girls are really cute, but not super beautiful like a barbie doll or typical centerfold. The girls are reminescent of girls you see in real life not in just magazines, so they are truly girls next door. All the girls are young and look to have real breasts. Getting to see these types of girls naked is new, since Playboy centerfolds all look the same.

If you're going to sell softcore porn, at least make it an interesting watch.  This is just a behind the scenes of a photo shoot they are trying to milk more money out of.

I don't see anyone over 13 enjoying this.

Check out Misty Mundae if you want softcore that's actually entertaining.
I just wanted to use that line anyway. I heart porn anyways.

This DVD is hot. The girls are so stunning. The camera doesn't waste any time showing us the goods and when we see them we get an eye full. The women are young and sexy and very girl-next-doorish. The feature is made more interesting because of the subsequent interviews of the girls themselves. Hearing the girls talk about themselves while we see them get naked is very arousing! You really do get a different effect when you hear the models talk and move as opposed to just seeing pictures of them in a magazine or on the Internet.

The girls look very comfortable, show no modesty, and you can tell that they are all just having fun.

This is an excellent DVD to watch on a lonely night!
